subject: FROM THE DESK OF REV.DR.CHIO
body:
FROM THE DESK OF REV.DR.CHIOMA NJOKU
DIRECTOR INTERNATIONAL REMITTANCE OFFICE,
CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA.
TELEPHONE:+234 9163606898
GREETING
Please be informed a Power Of Attorney was forwarded to this honorable Office today by two gentlemen and your lawyer Barrister Peter Egbe ,one of them is a Philippines national and he is ENGR.GILBERT M. USON by name while the other person is Mr.JACK MORGAN by name a CANADIAN national.
Your lawyer here and your representative barrister Peter Egbe claimed that this two gentle he came are your representative, and this power of attorney stated that you have died few days, they brought an account to replace your information and claimed your funds which it is right now lying DORMANT and UNCLAIMED, below is the new account they have submitted:
BANK.-BPI BANK
QUEZON AVE. DELTA BRANCH
QUEZON CITY, PHILIPPINES
ACCOUNT NO. 2984-0008-66
SWIFT CODE. BOPIPHMM
Be further informed that this power of attorney presented to our Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) also stated that you suffered and died of throat cancer.
You are therefore given 24hrs to confirm the truth in this information if you are still alive by acknowledging the receipt of this email.
Be informed that any further delay from your side could be dangerous, as we would not be held responsible for wrong payment.
Confirmation to us that you are dead. All necessary documents should be forwarded to the undersigned through me.
LASTLY, FOR YOUR INFORMATION MR. JACK MORGAN HAS ACCEPT TO FOOT ANY CHARGE AS LONG AS YOUR FUNDS BE TRANSFERRED TO THE ACCOUNT LISTED ABOVE.
I WILL BE EXPECTING YOU REPLY.HAVE A BLESSED DAY
YOURS SINCERELY
REV.DR.CHIOMA NJOKU
DIRECTOR INTERNATIONAL REMITTANCE OFFICE,
CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA.
DR.NWAOLU
Banking Remittance and Payments System Department(F.M.F
I TRIED TO REACH YOU ON YOUR PHONE  NUMBER AND UNFORTUNATE IS PROGRAMMED IN A VOICEMAIL,WOULD MIND TO ME WITH YOUR PAYMENT INFORMATION AND NEW TELEPHONE  NUMBER IF YOU ARE LIFE PLEASE.
A STITCH IN TIME SAVES NINE.

subject: Re:   FROM THE DESK OF REV.DR.CHIO
body:
Hello NJOKU,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite a surprise! I'm very much alive and well, no throat cancer here. It's strange that someone would claim otherwise.

I'm curious about these gentlemen who are claiming to be my representatives. Can you tell me more about them? How did they prove their identities to you?

Also, could you please explain more about the Power of Attorney they presented? What exactly does it state?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Barbara

subject: Re:   FROM THE DESK OF REV.DR.CHIOMA NJOKU,(CBN)/True/ False
body:
FROM THE DESK OF REV.DR.CHIOMA NJOKU,(CBN)/True/ FalseDIRECTOR INTERNATIONAL REMITTANCE OFFICE,CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA.TELEPHONE:+234 9163606898
GREETING BARBARA,
THANK YOU FOR YOUR MAIL.SINCE YOU SAID THAT YOU ARE NOT DEAD AND DID NOT SEND ANY MR.JACK MORGAN, TO CLAIM YOUR FUND ON YOUR BEHALF. WE HAVE RECEIVED YOUR MAIL, AND I CAN ASSURE YOU THAT TILL I HAVE HEARD FROM YOU ANY OTHER BUSINESS REGARDING THE RELEASE AND TRANSFER OF YOUR FUND IS WITHHELD FOR NOW.
AND FOR YOUR INFORMATION MR.JACK MORGAN AND HIS COHORTS CAME CALLING AGAIN SOLICITING THAT I SHOULD RELEASE YOUR FUNDS $10.5 MILLION DOLLARS INTO AN ACCOUNT IN LONDON AND THEY ARE OFFERING ME 10% OF THE TOTAL SUM, I TURN DOWN HIS OFFER BECAUSE I CANNOT BE BOUGHT OVER WITH MONEY IN THE DISCHARGE OF MY DUTY.
SO AS I TOLD YOU I WILL ADVISE YOU TO FORWARD TO ME YOUR BANK INFORMATION WHERE YOU WANT YOUR $10.5 MILLION DOLLARS TO BE TRANSFERRED TO YOU. MR. MORGANS IS NOT WORKING HERE IN THE CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA NEITHER IS HE A STAFF OF THE BANK, THEREFORE HE HAS NO RIGHT WHATSOEVER TO TRANSFER YOUR FUND, IN FACT I DO NOT HAVE ANY BODY WITH SUCH NAME IN THE LIST OF STAFF OF CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA, FOR YOUR GOOD PLEASE STOP ANY FURTHER COMMUNICATION WITH HIM.
Forward to me your Name and residential address for delivery if you wish to receive your funds by a Certified Bank Draft which is cash-able in any Bank in your State.
I TRIED TO REACH YOU ON YOUR PHONE NUMBER AND UNFORTUNATE IS PROGRAMMED IN A VOICEMAIL,WOULD MIND TO ME WITH YOUR PAYMENT INFORMATION AND NEW TELEPHONE NUMBER IF YOU ARE LIFE PLEASE.MY NUMBER:TEL:+234 9163606898.
I CONTACTED YOU BECAUSE OF THE NEGATIVE INTENTION OF THE SO CALLED MR. MORGANS TO DIVERT YOUR FUNDS INTO AN UNKNOWN ACCOUNT IN LONDON WHICH I REBUFFED, SO, TAKE THE MISCONCEPTION IN YOUR MIND AND DO FORWARD YOUR BANK ACCOUNT INFORMATION AT THE RECEIPT OF THIS MAIL FOR THE IMMEDIATE RELEASE AND TRANSFER YOUR FUND.
HOWEVER, IF YOUR HAVE ANY CHANGE IN YOUR BANK INFORMATION, DO NOT HESITATE TO FORWARD THE RIGHT INFORMATION TO ME FOR ONWARD CORRECTION AND REPROGRAMMED INTO THE NEW ACCOUNT OR BANK INFORMATION,IF YOU DO NOT HAVE ANY CHANGES IN IT STILL RE FORWARD TO AVOID MISTAKES IN WIRING YOUR $10.555MILLION DOLLARS.
PLEASE THE INFORMATION SHOULD BE STATE AS FOLLOWS:
1) BANK NAME :
(2) BANK ADDRESS:
(3) TOTAL AMOUNT EXPECTING:
(4) ACCOUNT NUMBER:
(5)ROUTING NUMBER, (IF ANY):
(6) SWIFT CODE:
(7) TELEPHONE NUMBER
HOWEVER, IF YOU FAIL TO PROVIDE ME WITH YOUR BANK INFORMATION TODAY, I WILL BE FORCE TO BELIEVE THAT YOU ARE IN AGREEMENT WITH MR.JACK MORGAN,AND I WILL GO AHEAD AND TRANSFER THE MONEY INTO THE BANK ACCOUNT IN LONDON.
LASTLY, FOR YOUR INFORMATION MR. JACK MORGAN HAS ACCEPT TO FOOT ANY CHARGE AS LONG AS YOUR FUNDS BE TRANSFERRED TO THE ACCOUNT LISTED ABOVE.
You are free to check with the embassy as you state, I will be expecting your response today, you have my International Passport/Bank Identification Card for verifications.
THANK AND GOD BLESS.REV.DR.CHIOMA NJOKU
N/B: I will advise you to stop any further communication with MR. JACK MORGAN and CO, he is out to extort you and because of the malpractices in the Bank the Federal Government of Nigeria saddled me the responsibility as a OFFICE OF THE INTERNATIONAL REMITTANCE,CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA to be in in charge of the international Remittance Office to monitor all the transactions and to transfer all the foreigners payment.

 Hello NJOKU,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite a surprise! I'm very much alive and well, no throat cancer here. It's strange that someone would claim otherwise.

I'm curious about these gentlemen who are claiming to be my representatives. Can you tell me more about them? How did they prove their identities to you?

Also, could you please explain more about the Power of Attorney they presented? What exactly does it state?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.
Best wishes,
Barbara

body:

subject: Re:   FROM THE DESK OF REV.DR.CHIOMA NJOKU,(CBN)/True/ False
body:
Hello NJOKU,

Thank you for your message. It's quite a surprise to hear about all this, especially the part about Morgan. I'm not sure who he is, but it sounds like you've been dealing with some difficult situations.

I'm curious though, how did you come across my name and why do you believe these funds belong to me? I don't recall having any dealings that would result in such a large sum of money. 

Also, could you please explain more about the process of transferring these funds? You mentioned something about an ATM card or draft. How does that work exactly?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Barbara

body:
FROM THE DESK OF REV.DR.CHIOMA NJOKU,(CBN)/True/ FalseDIRECTOR INTERNATIONAL REMITTANCE OFFICE,CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA.TELEPHONE:+234 9163606898
GREETING Barbara
Thank you for your message and all the content is well understood., i was only trying to communicate to you about your payment here in Nigeria. I want to know if you know one MR.JACK MORGAN, came to my office to bribe me of $2000 dollars for me to transfer your $10.5 MILLION DOLLARS into an account in London, unfortunately to him as i was going through your file, i saw that your Bank is in USA not in London as he claim.
Well, as a Rev i decided to call you to inquire if you are aware of this development before i can make any transfer to the account in London, if you are not aware of the account in London, i will crave your indulgence to send me your Bank information for reconfirmation and to enable me release and transfer your fund to your account in USA immediately.
I will advise you to stop any further communication with MR.JACK MORGAN and he is out to extort you and because of the malpractices in the Bank the Federal Government of Nigeria saddled me the responsibility as a Rev to be in charge of the international Remittance Office to monitor all the transactions and to transfer all the foreigners payment.
Forward to me your Name and residential address for delivery if you wish to receive your funds by a Certified Bank CHUQE OR MASTER CARD which is cashable in any Bank in your State.
What i need now from you immediately is your bank information.
PLEASE THE INFORMATION SHOULD BE STATE AS FOLLOWS: 
(1) BANK NAME: 
(2) BANK ADDRESS: 
(3) ACCOUNT NUMBER:
(4) ROUTING NUMBERs (IF ANY): 
(5) TOTAL AMOUNT EXPECTING 
Thanks and waiting to hear from you urgently.Rev(Dr) Chioma Njoku. Director International RemittanceOffice, Central Bank of Nigeria.
N/B: HOWEVER, IF YOU FAIL TO PROVIDE ME WITH YOUR BANK INFORMATION TODAY, I WILL BE FORCE TO BELIEVE THAT YOU ARE IN AGREEMENT WITH MR.JACK MORGAN,AND I WILL GO AHEAD AND TRANSFER THE MONEY INTO THE BANK ACCOUNT IN LONDON.
MORE-SO,I CRAVE FOR YOUR CURRENT TELEPHONE NUMBER FOR COMMUNICATION PURPOSE, AM FINDING IT DIFFICULT REACHING WITH YOUR FORMAL TELEPHONE NUMBER.

subject: Re:   FROM THE DESK OF REV.DR.CHIOMA NJOKU,(CBN)/True/ False
body:
Hello Dr. Chioma Njoku,

Thank you for reaching out to me and bringing this matter to my attention. I must say, I'm quite surprised by the information you've shared about this individual named Morgan. I don't recall having any dealings with a person by that name.

I appreciate your concern and efforts in ensuring the safety of my funds. However, I am not comfortable sharing my bank details over email due to security reasons. Is there another way we can proceed with this?

Also, could you please provide more details about this Certified Bank CHUQE OR MASTER CARD? How does it work? Is it safe and secure?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Barbara

subject: Re:   FROM THE DESK OF REV.DR.CHIOMA NJOKU,(CBN)/True/ False
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. It's really interesting to hear about this Certified Bank Cheque or Master Card. I'm not quite sure I understand how it works though. Could you please explain a bit more about how the ATM card works in any machine and how the Certified Bank Cheque can be deposited into my bank? 

Also, could you clarify what you mean by "withdraw dollars daily"? Is there a limit to how much I can withdraw each day? And when you say "wait for bank working to clear", do you mean that there is a waiting period before I can access the funds from the cheque?

I look forward to hearing more about this!

Best wishes,
Barbara
